about_the_game:
WHEN THE SNOW FALLS, SECRETS EMERGE...

Love Spell: Sergio’s Story features the ability to romance Sergio, The Black Lion, in the latest DLC for "Love Spell: Written in the Stars!"

​As an unusual snowfall blankets Pastoria Town, it brings with it far more than frosty nights and shimmering landscapes—it brings Sergio, a man with a dangerous charm, a mysterious past, and secrets that only deepen the intrigue.

With his arrival, a series of strange events unfold, leading you on a thrilling path through shadows, spells, secrets, and whispered promises.

❄️🦁

  • Unlock Sergio's Navigation Menu – Plunge into an engaging mystery romance with choices that reveal Sergio’s hidden past and bring you closer to understanding the secrets surrounding the snowfall.

  • Customizable Story-Driven Animations – Experience special scenes and subtle animations that immerse you in Sergio’s world, from wintry nights to captivating stares, all togglable from the Settings Menu to create your ideal romance.

  • Exclusive Backgrounds – Enjoy hand-drawn scenes of Pastoria Town transformed by snow, from charming streets dusted in white to secluded spots that only Sergio dares venture into.

  • Gorgeous CG Illustrations – Collect memorable CGs that capture every intense, tender, and mysterious moment with Sergio, the Black Lion.

  • New Music Tracks – Experience new musical pieces inspired by Sergio’s story, setting the tone for romance and mystery in equal measure.

  • New Characters & Familiar Faces – Meet intriguing new faces and reencounter familiar friends as they, too, are caught up in the strange snowfall, each adding to the mystery of Sergio’s story.

​

Sergio's Story welcomes both new & old players from the main series as his route starts right from the end of the original game's prologue!

(Though, we really recommend playing Love Spell: Written in The Stars first to fully enjoy all the easter eggs and familiar faces you'll encounter along the way!)
